articles.title: Why Donald Trump Wasn’t Charged With Insurrection
articles.description: Prosecutors had a mountain of evidence — but a series of key obstacles got in their way.
articles.content:
LOADING ERROR LOADING
What happened at the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021, according to many of the nation’s courts and judges, was an insurrection by the very definition of the word. So why, at the end of a yearslong probe, did special counsel Jack Sm... [9451 chars]

articles.author: Vancouver Is Awesome
articles.title: California pulls back EPA requests for approval to phase out diesel-powered trains and big rigs
articles.description: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) — California withdrew requests Tuesday for the federal government to allow the state to enforce rules limiting emissions from diesel-powered trains and big rigs in anticipation of the Trump administration rejecting them.
articles.content:
SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) — California withdrew requests Tuesday for the federal government to allow the state to enforce rules limiting emissions from diesel-powered trains and big rigs in anticipation of the Trump administration rejecting them.
